---
title: "Coulee Data Center"
---

The Coulee Data Center (CDC) is a community-focused data science organization. We partner with organizations in the Coulee region to amplify their impact by providing free data analysis.

On this website you can [learn more about us](about.qmd), [follow our work](projects.qmd), [become a partner](become_a_partner.qmd), [and even join our team](meet_our_team.qmd).
